container.heading: PARKING – PERSONS WITH DISABILITIES AND HELPERS

section.heading: Scope.
section.text: This chapter establishes rules and regulations that govern reserved parking for persons with disabilities and their helpers, including:

para.text: The application process for a reserved parking space; and
The renewal process for a reserved parking space.
In this chapter, the following terms have the meanings indicated.
Terms Defined.
Applicant.
"Applicant" means a person applying for a disabled parking space.
"Applicant" includes:
A person with disabilities; and
A helper.
"Department" means the Baltimore City Department of Transportation.
"Director" means the Director of the Baltimore City Department of Transportation.
"Disability space" means a reserved parking space for a person with disabilities.
"Helper" means a person who:
Renders assistance to a person with disabilities; and
Resides with the person with disabilities for whom a disability space is assigned.
"PABC" means the Parking Authority of Baltimore City.
"Person with disabilities" means an individual that meets the criteria of City Code Article 31, §9-1(a)(1-3).
"Renewal application" means the form that is provided for a space-holder to complete annually to maintain a disability space.
"Space-holder" means a person that has received a disability space through an approved application.
An applicant applying for a disability space for the first time shall:
Complete an application in the form that the Director requires; and
Acquire the application form by:
Obtaining a copy from the PABC office; or
Downloading a copy from the PABC website.
An applicant shall ensure a submitted application contains:
The required medical documentation; and
The noted requirements as specified in the application.
To maintain an assigned disability space, a space-holder shall complete a renewal application in accordance with these regulations.
Distribution of Renewal Application.
The PABC shall:
Ensure a renewal application is issued to a space-holder each year following the initial date that the disability space was awarded; and
Issue the renewal application to the address listed in the space-holder's initial application.
A space-holder shall return a renewal application to the PABC within 90 calendar days of receipt.
